item.title: Introducing MiiBot
item.content:encoded:
MiiBot v0.1 releases today!

If you're on one of the few servers that has the privilige of inviting MiiBot, you might be curious as to who he is. Don't worry - he's very friendly! He just doesn't have any friends...

MiiBot is a Discord Audio Bot written in C#, harnessing the power of slash commands for user interactions. It uses the DSharpPlus wrapper for the Discord API, along with the Lavalink API for audio playback.

Getting started is easy! Once MiiBot is on your server, you can already start to play your favourite songs.

Not sure where to begin? View the official MiiDocs!
